description:
Their music epitomizes the spirit of Advaita -- unity in diversity --
showcasing mesmerizing improvisations and rich, textured arrangements that
resonate with listeners worldwide.
name: Advaita Crescendo

performer.description: Advaita Crescendo is a groundbreaking ensemble that harmoniously blends the intricate rhythms of Indian Carnatic music with the fluid spontaneity of European jazz. Featuring a stellar lineup on veena, flute, piano, bass, and percussion, this mixed-gender group crafts compositions that reflect a dynamic interplay of tradition and innovation.
performer.name: Advaita Crescendo

description:
Her creative pursuits extend beyond music. She is a Cannes Gold Medal-winning
voice-over artist and an actress, known for her role in the Amazon Prime
series Die Trying, created by Kenny Sebastian. Driven by a deep passion for
music's power to unite and inspire, Soundarya approaches her craft with a
holistic vision, continually evolving as an artist.
name: Soundarya: It Is What It Is Tour

performer.description: Soundarya’s music seamlessly blends modern innovation with classical elegance, creating a fresh yet timeless sound. As the youngest AUDI Q3 Youth Ambassador and runner-up on The Stage—India’s premier English singing competition on VH1 and Colors Infinity—she has made an indelible mark in the music world.
performer.name: Soundarya
